comments:
Breakpoint at line 101 in AntLaunchShortcut
Debug selfhosting
Open an Ant editor
From the outline, Run Ant
Hit breakpoint
Make the variables view visible
Select the thread
Select the IDEApplication.run(Object) stack frame

Fixed in VariablesViewContentProvider and LogicalObjectStructureInterfaceType.

The root of the problem as that LogicalObjectStructureInterfaceType was 
returning "null" for a logical structure (not allowed by API). It was doing 
this since the evaluation performed for the "shell" in the selected stack 
frame threw an runtime exception (since it was disposed). The logical 
structure code should have thrown an exception instead (which it now does).

I also fixed up the VariablesViewContentProvider to safeguard against null 
being returned from a logical structure type, even though API says it should 
not happen.
*** Bug 63357 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
